short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Search Tab is a custom search engine with results powered by the most popular browser in the world

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension offers a great new web browsing experience with maximum functionality including address bar and new tab.
 
In addition, along with the practical functionality and beautiful design, this extension will display your bookmark URLs in the new tab.
 
Features include:
 
- ​100% free Chrome extension
-​Very easy to use with a clean set of results
- ​Built specifically for search
 
By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the My Search Tab Chrome extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab, Homepage takeover and Default Search to that provided by the service with results by Google, and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
 
Terms of Use: https://my-search-tab.com/terms.php
Privacy Policy: https://my-search-tab.com/privacy.php
